resources.string:
StudyShack is a productivity app which acts as a soft lock for you, removing all distractions on your phone! 

How does it work: 

1. Create your own Houses: 
In the Houses tab, you can create as many houses as you want and edit them whenever you want! Houses created represent areas or subjects you would like to focus on. 

2. Study Sessions: 
You can clock your study session in your specific house. Tap and drag on the SeekBar to adjust the how long you would like to study for. 
After clocking enough time in that house, you can even upgrade them! There is a total for 5 levels to reach! Study hard!

Note: 
If you leave the app while the timer is still running or stop the timer halfway, all recorded progress for that session so far will not be recorded! 

3. Track your study sessions: 
In the Statistics tab, you can also filter the graph by both Houses and Time period too! 

Made by: Lyndon Lim and Poon Jeun Hoe (Orbital Project)
